project_name.justification: The Company has signed a purchase agreement with a private vendor pursuant to which it acquires a 100% interest in a private limited liability Arizona company which holds the Hot claims located in the Shirley Basin of Wyoming.

company_name.justification: Indigo Exploration Inc. (TSXV: IXI) (OTCQB: IXIXF) (FSE: INEN) (the "Company") is pleased to announce that it has entered into an agreement to acquire a 100% interest in the Hot Property...

ceo_buyer.justification: On Behalf of the Board of Directors, "Paul Cowley", President and CEO

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The Company has signed a purchase agreement with a private vendor pursuant to which it acquires a 100% interest in a private limited liability Arizona company which holds the Hot claims...

primary_commodity.justification: ...to acquire a 100% interest in the Hot Property, a highly prospective uranium project located in the past producing Shirley Basin of Wyoming.

verified_article_link.justification: The article is titled 'Indigo Acquires Uranium Claims in Shirley Basin, Wyoming' and discusses the acquisition of the Hot Property, which is the project of interest.

currency.justification: Pursuant to the agreement, the Company will pay an aggregate of CDN$20,000...

cash_payments_raw.justification: Pursuant to the agreement, the Company will pay an aggregate of CDN$20,000 and make share issuance of 200,000 shares in the Company to earn 100% interest...

share_payments_raw.justification: The transaction is structured with explicit cash and number of shares issued, so this field is null as per the data extraction hierarchy.

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: The transaction is structured with explicit cash and number of shares issued, so this field is null as per the data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: Pursuant to the agreement, the Company will pay an aggregate of CDN$20,000 and make share issuance of 200,000 shares in the Company to earn 100% interest...

share_warrant_payments_raw.justification: No share warrants were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

option_payments_raw.justification: No options were mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

issued_share_price.justification: The transaction terms mention the number of shares issued, but not the price. Using the last traded price as a fallback, as seen in the detailed quote: 'Last: 0.09'.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the transaction terms.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: The text mentions the company will assume annual land holding costs of US$14,200, but this is an operating cost, not a specific exploration commitment value as part of the acquisition terms.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: The transaction terms explicitly state there is no royalty: '...to earn 100% interest, without any NSR royalty.'

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Hot Property, which is comprised of 71 unpatented mineral claims covering a 5.75 km2area...

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Hot Property, which is comprised of 71 unpatented mineral claims covering a 5.75 km2area...

resource_size.justification: The text states that 'Multiple campaigns of drilling will likely be needed to justify a NI 43-101 mineral resource,' implying no current resource exists for the Hot project. The resource mentioned ('8.8 Mlb U3O8') belongs to the adjacent Shirley Basin project owned by Ur-Energy Inc.

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: The buyer is identified as Indigo Exploration Inc., and the text provides its ticker and exchange in the format 'TSXV: IXI'. 'Indigo Exploration Inc. (TSXV: IXI) (OTCQB: IXIXF) (FSE: INEN) (the "Company") is pleased to announce...'
